Mon, 26 Aug 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Glengarry Lifecare in Wairoa closed 18 months ago, following the February 14 Cyclone Gabrielle flooding. Eastland Rescue chopper uplifts injured walker https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/27/eastland-rescue-chopper-uplifts-injured-walker/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/08/27/eastland-rescue-chopper-uplifts-injured-walker/ Call-out to Tuahine Point after walker suffers leg injury Mon, 26 Aug 2024 17:01:00 +0000 The Trust Tairāwhiti Eastland Rescue Helicopter crew got help to an injured walker at Tuahine Point on Sunday, landing on the beach to pick up the patient and fly them to Gisborne Hospital.
